Title: Requires notice of certain ex parte communications
Summary: Requires notice of any ex parte communications or visits before the public service commission by a party to a hearing or investigation be given in writing to any affected party and to give such affected parties an opportunity to respond.
LawCode: Add ยง20-a, Pub Serv L; amd ยง307, St Ad Proc Act
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public service law and the state administrative procedure act, in relation to ex parte communications
